document_data.name: Agundar
document_data.symbol: Sky blue field withe a purple cloud and white lightning bolt
document_data.mainbody: '''Agundar''' ({{Pronounce|ah|GUN|dar|refs=}}) was a [[Nobility of Waterdeep|noble house]] of [[Waterdeep]], of [[Tethyrian]] descent, that had a history within the city spanning over three hundreds years up to the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Organization: The Agundar family was officially ennobled in [[1116 DR]]. As of [[1368 DR]], the patriarch of the family was [[Torres Agundar]]. The consort at this time was his 23-year-old fiance, [[Lynneth Sinmeklos]] and the family heir was Torres' 27-year-old son from his first marriage, [[Torres Agundar II]].  At this time there were approximately twenty-nine members of the family.
document_data.Activities: They were known for their work with mercenaries, martial-training and [[weapon]]-forging.
document_data.Base of Operations: Like most Waterdhavian nobles, the Agundar family kept a villa in the city's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]], on the south side of [[Hassantyr's Street]] between [[Shield Street]] and [[Copper Street]].
document_data.Members:
*[[Torres Agundar]]: The patriarch of the family circa [[1368 DR]].
*[[Lynneth Sinmeklos]]: Fiance and consort to Torres.
*[[Torres Agundar II]]: Son of patriarch Torres and heir to the Agundar family.
*[[Wardon Agundar]]
